data.name: Dungeon_Crypt
data.value: Crypt

data.name: Dungeon_Crypt_Description
data.value:
There is something stirring beneath the graveyard...
This dungeon awards armor pieces

data.name: Dungeon_CultistCastle
data.value: Cult's Stronghold

data.name: Dungeon_CultistCastle_Description
data.value: The traiterous lord who had hired the mercenaries has turned his castle into the cult's base of operations.

data.name: Dungeon_EndgameAges
data.value: Palace of Ages

data.name: Dungeon_EndgameAges_Description
data.value: In this place, the past and the future are one and the same. It was and will be constructed by the leaders of many civilizations among the mystical terrains of the far plains.

data.name: Dungeon_EndgameDistant
data.value: The Red Pagoda

data.name: Dungeon_EndgameDistant_Description
data.value: Atop a distant mountain, the Red Pagoda is overlooking the clouds and the lands below.

data.name: Dungeon_EndgameMagic
data.value: Wizard Academy

data.name: Dungeon_EndgameMagic_Description
data.value: This magical place is hidden away in the remote highlands. Here, the most promising young apprentices were educated in the art of magic.

data.name: Dungeon_EndgamePyramid
data.value: Banished Pyramid

data.name: Dungeon_EndgamePyramid_Description
data.value: Glowing portals lead to the entrance of this monument. It was built by an ancient race that has since been exiled from this world.

data.name: Dungeon_EndgameTechnology
data.value: The Sunken City

data.name: Dungeon_EndgameTechnology_Description
data.value: There's a forgotten city in a deep trench in the bottom of the sea...

data.name: Dungeon_Labyrinth
data.value: Labyrinth

data.name: Dungeon_Labyrinth_Description
data.value: Below the castle, there is a huge, labyrinthine dungeon. This must be where the leader of the cult is hiding.

data.name: Dungeon_Lighthouse
data.value: Beacon

data.name: Dungeon_Lighthouse_Description
data.value: Cultists have made their base at this beacon to prepare their ritual.

data.name: Dungeon_MercenaryCamp
data.value: Mercenary Camp

data.name: Dungeon_MercenaryCamp_Description
data.value: The cultists have acquired the services of a company of human mercenaries. Raiding their camp and killing their leader should drive them away.

data.name: Dungeon_RatDen
data.value: Den of Rats

data.name: Dungeon_RatDen_Description
data.value:
Fighting rats, clearing some kind of den... A good start to a glorious adventure.
This dungeon awards weapons

data.name: Dungeon_ReturnToLighthouse
data.value: Lighthouse

data.name: Dungeon_ReturnToLighthouse_Description
data.value: This ancient lighthouse is the nexus of the cult's final ritual.

data.name: Dungeon_Temple
data.value: Ancient Temple

data.name: Dungeon_Temple_Description
data.value: The cultists have relocated to the catacombs below the ruins of an ancient elven temple.

data.name: Dungeon_Threshold
data.value: The Threshold

data.name: Dungeon_Threshold_Description
data.value: The ritual has been completed and the gate between the dimensions has been opened. An army of demons is flooding through the rift. Stand fast and fight them off!
